attributes.action: help change the lack of positive Black-British representation on mainstream British TV.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My name is Amanda Amory, I am an aspiring scriptwriter and I feel that there is a lack of positive Black-British representation on television, and would like this changed. 

There is a wealth of vibrancy, humour, drama and passion in the Black-British community that deserves to be heard on TV and there are many talented actors/writers on television who have blazed a trail for us, but there is still room for MUCH more.

I have personally heard from Television Industry professionals that there is a need for a larger Black representation on TV as what we have now is far from ideal, which is unfortunate in this day and age and in such a multicultural society such as ours. 

This is why I am urging you to please sign this petition in the hope that it changes things for the better.

Thankyou.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
